name: Systemic_Decay
display_help: Anti-Matter's control over space and time grants him the ability to disassemble matter on a sub-atomic level. This effect radiates off his presence continuously, but can be negated simply by moving. The longer his targets remain stationary, the worse the damage to their body becomes.

name: Disintegration
display_help: Anti-Matter's control over space and time grants him the ability to disassemble matter on a sub-atomic level. He is currently attempting to disintegrate you. During this attack, you are frozen in place and damage will be dealt to you continuously, with each pulse harming you for a greater percentage of your health. If you die during the Disintegration, a portion of the matter is returned to Anti-Matter, healing him. If you survive the Disintegration, you will be drained of half of their maximum endurance. Note that Disintegration is unaffected by Recharge Time changes. Recharge: Slow
